title: Jack The Ripper Concept
body:
Jeff the Ripper is a Murderer. Adept at killing people and then dissapearing again.

Passive: Dismissed of life.
1. Killing a champion allows Jeff's next click to dash to the location within 575/700/825/950 range after 0.75 sec channel.
2. Attacks deal 0.5/0.75/1/1.25% enemy missing HP as damage. The attack that reduce their health to 75%, 50%, 25% or below slows them by 20%.

Q: Rip 18/17/16/15/14sec
Rips open a target within 250 range. Dealing 8% MAX HP  and 55/110/165/220/275+15/20/25/30/35%AD Physical damage and reduces Armor and MR by (Their Level) x 3. 

W: Throat Slit 31/29.5/28/26.5/25sec
Flashes behind an enemy, slitting its throat if they stay within his auto range after 0.4 seconds. Deals 4/5/6/7/8% Missing HP +20/35/50/65/80+ 90/105/120/135/150% AD Physical Damage. However every 50 Armor the enemy has, it deals 5% Less Damage.

E: Hop, Hop, Hop and away. 28/26/24/22/20sec
Passive: Killing a champion causes Jeff to laugh maniacally, it has a global range. Enemies are all feared for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 seconds.
Acitve: Steps on a  target, bouncing off it, dealing 10/15/20/25/30% Current HP as Physical Damage and jumps up to 555 range.
If he lands on another unit within that range, he can jump again up to 4 times. Mininum of 40/80/120/160/200 physical Damage.


R: Killing Spree. 120/105/90 sec.
Laughs manically, fearing global for 2/2.5/3 seconds This does not stack with the Passive of Hop, Hop, Hop and away.
His next attack or Rip/ Throat Slit will deal an additional 25/35/45% of the enemies Missing HP as Bonus Physical Damage. Killing the unit resets the spells cooldown and gains him 10/15/20% Movement speed for 3 seconds.

replies.body:
Global Fear?

What's the idea behind this?
so he can let his team chase or run away from the enemey, as well as a great team fight strategy.
